mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sys_menu a
ORDER BY a.sort
SELECT a.id, a.parent_id AS "parent.id", a.parent_ids FROM sys_menu a WHERE a.parent_ids LIKE #{parentIds} ORDER BY a.sort

SELECT DISTINCT
FROM sys_menu a LEFT JOIN sys_menu p ON p.id = a.parent_id JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = a.id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = rm.role_id AND r.useable='1' JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = r.id JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ur.user_id AND u.id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.sort
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_menu( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, href, target, icon, sort, is_show, permission, create_date, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{href}, #{target}, #{icon}, #{sort}, #{isShow}, #{permission}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_menu SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, href = #{href}, target = #{target}, icon = #{icon}, sort = #{sort}, is_show = #{isShow}, permission = #{permission}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
DELETE FROM sys_menu WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
